|birth_name = John Ogwen |birth_date = {{birth date and age|1944|4|25|df=y}} |birth_place = {{nowrap|Sling, [[Bethesda, Gwynedd|Bethesda]], [[North Wales]]}} |death_date = |death_cause = |death_place = |occupation = Television/film actor |known_for = |title = |residence = [[Bangor, Gwynedd|Bangor]], [[Wales]] |education = |alma mater = [[Bangor University]] |nationality = [[Wales|Welsh]] |religion = |ethnicity = |parents = |yearsactive = 1968 - present |spouse = [[Maureen Rhys]] |children = 3 }} '''John Ogwen''' (born 25 April 1944) is a [[Wales|Welsh]] actor.
Best known to British audiences for his starring role in the 1978 drama series ''Hawkmoor'', and appearances in the [[television]] series ''[[The District Nurse]]'' and the ''[[Doctor Who]]'' serial ''[[Revelation of the Daleks]]'', Ogwen has been a stalwart of [[Welsh language]] television and film since the early 1970s. He has also written plays, presented documentary series and recorded readings of Welsh-language works.
In 2004 he was awarded a BAFTA Cymru Special Award for his contribution.<ref>[http://www.bafta-cymru.org.uk/english/awards/awards.php?year=2003&page=8 BAFTA Cymru Awards]</ref>
He was born and raised in Sling, [[Bethesda, Gwynedd|Bethesda]], [[North Wales]], and studied English and Welsh at [[Bangor University]]. When told, "You'll have to make up your mind whether you want to be a nationalist or an actor", he replied, "I'll be a bit of both."<ref>[http://www.bbc.co.uk/cymru/gogleddorllewin/enwogion/adloniant/pages/johnogwen.shtml Profile on BBC Cymru site (in Welsh)]</ref>
He has a keen interest in football, and played as a striker for [[Bangor City F.C.]] when still in the 6th Form at school. Today he is a keen [[Everton F.C.]] supporter.<ref>[http://www.bbc.co.uk/cymru/gogleddorllewin/enwogion/adloniant/pages/johnogwen.shtml Profile on BBC Cymru site (in Welsh)]</ref>
He is married to [[Maureen Rhys]], one of Wales' most recognisable actresses,<ref>[http://www.caernarfononline.co.uk/dec2006/maureen/ Caernarvon Online]</ref> and in the past they have frequently worked together in productions. They have three children, and live in [[Bangor, Gwynedd|Bangor]].
